name: service_name
description: Name of the AI service (e.g., Claude, OpenAI, Perplexity)

name: api_type
description: Type of API (REST, GraphQL, gRPC, etc.)

name: secret_name
description: Name of the Secret Manager secret containing API credentials

name: models
description: JSON object containing model pricing information

name: adapter_module
description: Python module name for the service adapter

name: active
description: Whether this service is currently active for monitoring

name: data_collection_frequency
description: Cron expression for data collection frequency (overrides global setting)

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when this configuration was last updated
